SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.Name, AA.CategoryName, AA.Name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID , AA.BrandCode , AA.Code , AA.Name , AA.Url , AA.ListPrice , AA.SalePrice , AA.Option1Type , AA.Option1Name , AA.Option1Value , AA.Option2Type , AA.Option2Name , AA.Option2Value , AA.CategoryName , AA.CategoryID , AA.Gender
, BB.Name as BrandName
FROM dbo.TScrapProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TScrapBrand BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.SiteID = BB.SiteID AND AA.BrandCode = BB.Code WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND AA.BrandCode = #BrandCode#
AND AA.CategoryID = #CategoryID#
AND ( AA.Code = #FindText# OR AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
